articles.title: Top News Headlines of August 26, 2025
articles.description: The United States has announced plans to implement 50% tariffs on products imported from India, effective August 27. This follows a previous 25% tariff penalty on India for purchasing Russian oil. Additionally, the Supreme Court has ordered a Special Investigation Team (SIT) to probe the Vantara wildlife center in Gujarat.

articles.title: Three More Palestinians Starve to Death in Gaza as Israeli Forces Kill 75 in a Day
articles.description: Over the past 24 hours, three more Palestinians have died of starvation in Gaza, bringing the total to 303. Israeli forces killed at least 75 Palestinians, including 17 seeking food, on Monday. Press freedom groups are criticizing Israel for a strike on Nasser Hospital that killed 21 people, including five journalists.

articles.title: Cabinet approves India's 2030 CWG bid; U.S. 50% tariff on Indian goods in effect
articles.description: The Union Cabinet has approved India's bid to host the 2030 Commonwealth Games in Ahmedabad. Meanwhile, the U.S. 50% tariff on Indian goods is now in effect. The Israeli military continues operations around Gaza City, while President Trump is preparing to host a meeting on post-war plans for the territory.
